get.description:
You can send query with endpoint for filter[],search[], sort[], page and limit.
    Examples:
  • URL/?filter[field1]=value1&filter[field2]=value2
  • URL/?search[field1]=value1&search[field2]=value2
  • URL/?sort[field1]=1&sort[field2]=-1
  • URL/?page=2&limit=1

post.description: Create a new user!!</br> - Password type Rules- [lenght:8-16, at least: 1 upper, 1 lower, 1 number, 1 special[@$!%*?&]]

400.description: Bad Request - username,email and password fields are required!
Bad Request invalid id...
Bad Request - username,email and password fields are required!

400.description: Bad Request - invalid id!

post.description: Create a new car!!</br>- year must be between min 2000 to max current year
